channel.title: Client error need help
channel.description:
When i load the 508 client which i added cache to the c drive and it shows this
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException:client

item.title: Client error need help
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

means you are missing a class file in your client if i am reading it right…if its your custom one backtrack and see if one is missing. If you downloaded it, try it again. Check to see if you are missing any numbers as it is sequential(1,2,3,4,5) for most clients so should be easy to spot

Read full topic
